candidates.name: Can I use multiple authentication methods together?
candidates.acceptedAnswer: Yes, you can combine JWT for API auth with Cloudflare Access for admin routes, and Turnstile for bot protection on public forms.

candidates.name: How do I handle authentication in a multi-tenant app?
candidates.acceptedAnswer: Use tenant-specific JWT secrets, isolate sessions per tenant in Durable Objects, and implement tenant-scoped access controls.

candidates.name: What's the difference between JWT and sessions?
candidates.acceptedAnswer: JWT is stateless and stored client-side, while sessions require server-side storage but offer better control over token revocation.

candidates.name: How do I secure my authentication endpoints?
candidates.acceptedAnswer: Use HTTPS, implement rate limiting, validate all inputs, use secure headers, and consider Cloudflare Access for additional protection.
